content: Investments Online Brokerages ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Apr 2019Which broker do you recommend to invest in s and p 500 etf? Currently looking for a broker to purchase the S&P500 ETF... Taking into account brokerage, trading and commission fees incurred which would be the best for someone who is doing monthly RSP?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 26 Jun 2019The common brokers brandished here are Td Ameritrade and interactive brokers. Both will allow you to access the US market. I'm using TD Ameritrade personally and I find it very user friendly, with a great charting tool. There are no inactivity, custodian or data feed fees as well.2 comments0

Cheng Yuan Yong26 Jun 2019Would u wanna take a look at, DollarDex?
